Description: Calcite shabti figure, crudely modelled, with face, headdress and crossed arms depicted in paint; hands holding hoes. Hieroglyphic inscription on lower body: sehedj formula followed by the prenomen of Ramesses VI.
Acquisition notes: Part of lot 7 in 1836 Sotheby auction of Burton collection. 'B. c. 7' written in ink on back of object.
